Drawing, "Plan Development and Elevation for a Spiral Staircase that turns to the Right", March 1886.
March 1886. Graphite and brush and watercolor, pen and black ink on cream laid paper. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2007-53-4.
